work.title: Our Work
work.description: We work on a lot of projects which focus on our local community. So far we have done a lot in our Town.

about.title: About us
about.description: We are the school parliament of Travnik, we do all sorts of projects that help us and the community.

goals.title: Our goals
goals.description: We plan to expand our services to the entire nation in order to shape our country in a better way.

intro.description: This website is designed for the International University of Travnik Student Parliament, and serves for their neccessary needs. On this website you can see events, news and projects the students of the International University of Travnik have done and made. To read more about the given projects check out the news feed.

about.description: The student parliament consists of young individuals who are seeking new challenges every day. They operate from within the college and get new tasks each month to improve their skill set and show what the youth can do. So far our student parliament has improved the city and done numerous projects showing off their skill set.
